last_episode_to_air.name: Tig N’ Seek Nights
last_episode_to_air.overview: Gweeseek has the adventure of a lifetime when she chases her favorite toy out the window… and into danger. Meanwhile, back at the Department, Tiggy and Boss think they’ve turned themselves invisible.

name: Tig n' Seek
overview: Follow 8-year-old Tiggy and his gadget-building cat, Gweeseek, as they search for the lost items of Wee Gee City. With Tiggy’s cheerful attitude and Gweeseek’s exceptional inventing capabilities, the duo humorously navigate day-to-day dilemmas at the Department of Lost and Found.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: In season three, Tiggy and Gweeseek break new ground when they take on a backyard camping expedition, suspect an alien invasion, encounter unruly toddlers, and match wits with a master thief.

episodes.name: The Five Rules of Finding
episodes.overview: Tiggy and Gweeseek use Chief's Five Rules of Finding to discover their own method of finding and locating Boss' missing tie.

episodes.name: Cat Burglar
episodes.overview: While Tiggy and Boss work hard to cover their tracks after they're caught up in a cat burglary, a new churro cart catches Gweeseek's eye.

episodes.name: Cat Toy of the Future
episodes.overview: Tiggy's attempt to create a new toy for Gweeseek turns the Department of Lost and Found into Cat Central.

episodes.name: Picky Prangle
episodes.overview: In the Pie's Day, Prangle Penguin is already way behind on his strawberry pie deliveries. Hoping to improve their helpfulness rating, Tig and Seek take on the task of pie-making, even as things quickly take a not-so-sweet turn.

episodes.name: Lost in the Lost & Found
episodes.overview: When Boss sends Tiggy and Gweeseek into the cellar to fetch a tuba, Tiggy must be brave and overcome his fears of the "Cellar Feller".

episodes.name: Eggy Weggy
episodes.overview: Tiggy and Gweeseek realize parenting is difficult after they bring home an abandoned egg that's due to hatch any minute.

episodes.name: Baby and the Dog
episodes.overview: On a mission to find an orange tennis ball, Tig and Seek encounter their worst nightmares: a baby and a dog.

episodes.name: The Tig-Tale Heart
episodes.overview: When the office becomes obsessed with a Baby Bobo toy that Tiggy and Gweeseek found, a jealous Tiggy decides to put an end to it's song and dance moves for good.

episodes.name: Who's This Guy
episodes.overview: This Guy is more wound up than usual and Tiggy encourages him to take a relaxing day off. Left in the office, Tig and Seek learn it's harder than they thought to keep things orderly.

episodes.name: The Tooth of Manhood
episodes.overview: After losing a tooth and deciding it's time to grow up and be serious, Tiggy risks ruining the rockin' party he planned for Gweeseek's Gotcha Day.

episodes.name: The Tiggy Trap
episodes.overview: Tiggy and Boss square off against This Guy and Nuritza, the reigning champs of office charades. When Nuritza and This Guy's fight derails the game, Tiggy sets aside his desire to win broker peace between friends.

episodes.name: An Easy Fix
episodes.overview: After Tiggy questions Nuritza's handy-rabbit skills, the two trade place, and Tiggy discovers that the job of fixing things comes with a lot more challenges than finding things.

episodes.name: Tiny Tiggy Tennis
episodes.overview: In his quest to find a game he actually win, Tiggy stumbles upon a table tennis set. While his wish of beating (almost) everyone in the office comes true, the real challenge becomes scheduling a match against Boss.

episodes.name: Champ
episodes.overview: Boss' nephew Champ visits the office for the day and Tiggy discovers that this "good boy" is really a naughty little kid who will do anything to get his way.

episodes.name: Tig Sawyer
episodes.overview: Nuritza's job is to repaint the office walls, but she manages to trick Tiggy and Gweeseek into painting the walls for her.

episodes.name: Just Kitten
episodes.overview: Tig can't get Seek to stop distracting him, but after she finds a new prime stop atop This Guy's head, a clingy Tiggy must deal with his feelings of jealousy and abandonment.

episodes.name: The Search Engine
episodes.overview: On a mission to recover a pair of fuzzy dice from the junkyard, Tig and Seek battle it out with out with Boss' brand-new robot, Search Engine, to prove they're the better finders.

episodes.name: Seeking Safety
episodes.overview: After Tiggy learns from This Guy that cats really don't have nine lives, he becomes obsessed with making life in the office extra save for an adventurous Gweeseek.

episodes.name: The Department of Lost Gold
episodes.overview: When Tiggy, Gweeseek and Nuritza discover a mysterious map, the promise of buried treasure and gold threatens to make these friends turn on each other.

episodes.name: Within the Walls
episodes.overview: When Gweeseek crawls into the Department walls, Tiggy things she's been abducted by ghosts that haunt the Department.

episodes.name: The Curse
episodes.overview: Tiggy and Gweeseek discover a terrifying music box and with it, a curse.

episodes.name: Breaking News
episodes.overview: Tig and Seek rope the crew into a fake finding mission in order to impress a local newspaper reporter.

episodes.name: Tiggy Two-Shoes
episodes.overview: Tiggy acts out to prove he can be a bad boy.

episodes.name: Gloppy Joes
episodes.overview: Tiggy causes chaos in the Department when he pretends to love Boss's cooking.

episodes.name: Cookie Trouble
episodes.overview: Tiggy and Gweeseek face their most devious foe yet: a cookie scout named Skippy.

episodes.name: Nibbles
episodes.overview: Tiggy passes himself off as a cat expert to Prangle Penguin with disastrous results.

episodes.name: Tragic Magic
episodes.overview: When Tiggy tests out a new magic trick, people in the office mysteriously disappear.

episodes.name: Hair Today
episodes.overview: A mix-up at the groomers causes Tiggy to mistake a cranky, hairless cat for Gweeseek. Guest star: Louie Anderson as Chester the pet groomer.

episodes.name: The Decider
episodes.overview: When Boss and Nuritza fight over a large pencil, Tiggy must decide who keeps it.

episodes.name: Game Over
episodes.overview: In a spoof of after school special, an arcade game obsession pushes Tiggy and Gweeseek past the brink of sanity.

episodes.name: Fretting Zoo
episodes.overview: Tiggy seeks vengeance upon an adorable baby goat who humiliated him.

episodes.name: The Ring
episodes.overview: Tiggy and Prangle Penguin compete for Mrs. Grendelson's heart.

episodes.name: Chester's Roasting On A Open Fire
The Li'l Pipsqueaks in Pie in the Sky

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: In season three, Tiggy and Gweeseek break new ground when they take on a backyard camping expedition, suspect an alien invasion, encounter unruly toddlers, and match wits with a master thief.

episodes.name: Pipsqueaks! The Musical
episodes.overview: Tiggy helps the Lil’ Pipsqueaks find a new hangout after accidentally destroying their clubhouse.

episodes.name: Real Gweenius
episodes.overview: Tiggy enters a science fair to impress Georgia, but a romantic rival soon steals his thunder.

episodes.name: Must Gwee TV
episodes.overview: Tiggy and the crew watch a bunch of retro television shows.

episodes.name: A Bucket of Blub
episodes.overview: When Gweeseek accidentally creates an artistic masterpiece, This Guy takes all the credit.

episodes.name: Wanted: Dumb or Alive
episodes.overview: After discovering a photo of Boss in a fake “wanted poster,” Tiggy and Nuritza decide to turn him in for the reward.

episodes.name: Uncle Sarkis
episodes.overview: Tiggy does whatever it takes to prove he’s cooler than Prangle’s favorite uncle.

episodes.name: Rainy with a Chance of Clowns
episodes.overview: Boss-O the Clown unintentionally causes panic when he makes a surprise appearance at Champ’s birthday party.

episodes.name: The Hand That Stamps the Paper
episodes.overview: This Guy fears he’s going to be replaced at the Department.

episodes.name: American Jam Stand
episodes.overview: After Tiggy jinxes him, Prangle finds himself unable to speak – putting his upcoming cooking segment on local TV in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Wack E. Doodle Dandy
episodes.overview: Tig has an existential crisis after discovering that his favorite arcade mascot is just a guy in a costume.

episodes.name: Tiny Tiggy Tennis Shoes
episodes.overview: A cool pair of sneakers threatens to ruin Tiggy’s first date with Georgia.

episodes.name: Twin Seeks
episodes.overview: Tiggy and the gang visit a strange little town… where the pigs are not what they seem.

episodes.name: The Marvelous Mrs. Penguinian
episodes.overview: When Rosie Penguinian becomes a smash hit at Tig n’ Seek’s comedy open mic, Prangle feels abandoned.

episodes.name: Hands on a Bowling Ball
episodes.overview: Tiggy and Boss enter a competition to see who can keep their hand on a bowling ball the longest.

episodes.name: Search Engine MKII
episodes.overview: When he accidentally breaks Boss’s new Search Engine, Tiggy impersonates the robot to help cover up his misdeed.

episodes.name: The Irate Outdoors
episodes.overview: Tiggy and the crew face the elements when a camping getaway goes awry.

episodes.name: Night of the Scooper
episodes.overview: When Tiggy stops a criminal on the run, Boss takes all the credit. Tiggy wants to be recognized as the hero… until the criminal shows up at the Department’s doorstep.

episodes.name: Tiggy Saves Christmas
episodes.overview: After accidentally landing Santa in the hospital, Tiggy and Boss take it upon themselves to save Christmas.

episodes.name: Tig N’ Seek Nights
episodes.overview: Gweeseek has the adventure of a lifetime when she chases her favorite toy out the window… and into danger. Meanwhile, back at the Department, Tiggy and Boss think they’ve turned themselves invisible.
